meanings.definition: The hard covering on the upper surface of the tip of each toe.
meanings.sent1: I painted my toenail with bright red polish.
meanings.sent2: She stubbed her toe and broke her toenail.
meanings.sent3: The toenail on the big toe decided to rebel and grow faster than the others.
meanings.sent4: Her toenail was like a tiny shield protecting her toe.
meanings.sent5: The podiatrist examined my toenail closely to check for any issues.

meanings.definition: To trim or cut the hard covering on the upper surface of the tip of each toe.
meanings.sent1: I need to toenail my nails before the beach trip.
meanings.sent2: She carefully toenailed her toenails to keep them neat.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally toenailed too much and had to wait for it to grow back.
meanings.sent4: She toenailed her toenails with precision, like an artist painting a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: To toenail properly, you should use sharp clippers and go slowly.
